content.html: Them: How would you design the microservice architecture of this feature?? Me: I’ve got no clue. I’ve written like 2 SQL queries in my whole life without an ORM. But I can center a div in every conceivable way! Plus, I’m like super good at React, yo. 🤷🏼‍♂️
content.value:
Them: How would you design the microservice architecture of this feature??

Me: I’ve got no clue. I’ve written like 2 SQL queries in my whole life without an ORM. But I can center a div in every conceivable way! Plus, I’m like super good at React, yo. 🤷🏼‍♂️
